issues.title: Native paragraph element used
issues.description:
Replace native

tags with shadcn typography primitives to adhere to design tokens. See docs/rules/ui-rules.md#typography.
issues.fix_pattern:
Swap

for the matching shadcn text slot such as CardDescription or Paragraph.

issues.title: CardHeader missing CardTitle
issues.description: CardHeader must include CardTitle to deliver semantic headings. See docs/rules/ui-rules.md#card-composition.
issues.fix_pattern: Add <CardTitle> within the CardHeader to label the card.

issues.title: Button missing variant
issues.description: Always pass an explicit variant to Button to enforce design tokens. See docs/rules/ui-rules.md#button-variants.
issues.fix_pattern: Set the Button variant prop (e.g., variant="default" or variant="outline").

issues.title: Button missing variant
issues.description: Always pass an explicit variant to Button to enforce design tokens. See docs/rules/ui-rules.md#button-variants.
issues.fix_pattern: Set the Button variant prop (e.g., variant="default" or variant="outline").

issues.title: Interactive control missing aria-label
issues.description: Icon-only interactive controls require aria-label or aria-labelledby for accessibility. See docs/rules/ui-rules.md#accessibility.
issues.current_code:
<Button variant="ghost" className="relative h-9 w-9 rounded-full">
      <Avatar className="h-9 w-9">
        <AvatarImage src={userData.avatar || undefined} alt={user.email || 'User'} />
        <AvatarFallback>{getInitials(user)}</AvatarFallback>
      </Avatar>
    </Button>
issues.fix_pattern: Add aria-label or aria-labelledby describing the control action.

issues.title: Interactive control missing aria-label
issues.description: Icon-only interactive controls require aria-label or aria-labelledby for accessibility. See docs/rules/ui-rules.md#accessibility.
issues.current_code:
<Button asChild variant="outline" className="flex-1 gap-2">
        <Link href={homeHref}>
          <Home className="h-4 w-4" />
          {homeLabel}
        </Link>
      </Button>
issues.fix_pattern: Add aria-label or aria-labelledby describing the control action.

issues.title: Interactive control missing aria-label
issues.description: Icon-only interactive controls require aria-label or aria-labelledby for accessibility. See docs/rules/ui-rules.md#accessibility.
issues.current_code:
<Button variant="ghost" size="sm" onClick={handleCopy} className="h-7 gap-1">
            {copied ? (
              <>
                <Check className="h-3 w-3" />
                Copied
              </>
            ) : (
              <>
                <Copy className="h-3 w-3" />
                Copy
              </>
            )}
          </Button>
issues.fix_pattern: Add aria-label or aria-labelledby describing the control action.
